GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.24 to before v4.14.301
GSD.description:
hwmon: (ibmpex) Fix possible UAF when ibmpex_register_bmc() fails

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.301 by commit 798198273bf86673b970b51acdb35e57f42b3fcb, it was introduced in version v2.6.24 by commit 57c7c3a0fdea95eddcaeba31e7ca7dfc917682ab. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: hwmon: (ibmpex) Fix possible UAF when ibmpex_register_bmc() fails
